segments.text: Those kids are being so mischievous, climbing up to get cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks so unstable and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe he hasn't fallen yet, it looks so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, looking so expectant and hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies they've already taken without the woman knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to what's happening behind her, it's almost frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that she's not paying attention to the children or the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second, and it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt, they're just kids after all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is making me feel a bit stressed just watching it, I want to warn them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to intervene before something bad happens, like the woman slipping or the boy falling.
segments.speaker: PAR
